name: Lightbeam Courier Coin
description: ​Beginning January 2nd 2022 we will begin issuing the Lightbeam Courier Coin as a reward token for customers that use our delivery service either through our Lightbeam Courier App or via our website. Our customers can then use these coins as a discount for future deliveries or FREE delivery; as well as TRADE for other crypto’s like BTC, ETH, TRANSFER, store as VALUE or HODL!!
